required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Promoting Physical Activity and Reducing Sedentary Time in Small and Middle-sized Companies

oversight_info.authority: Finland: The UKK Institute for Health Promotion Research
Finland: Finnish Institute of Occupational Health

brief_summary.textblock: The participants are twelve small or middle-sized companies. A team is nominated in each company to develop company's practices in relation to promoting physical activity and reducing sedentary behavior among employees. Baseline information about the company's practices and employees' physical activity is collected in November 2013 with questionnaires and accelerometers. The teams are supported with materials and three meetings and the opportunity to obtain physical activity services from the regional offices of the Finnish Sport Confederation. The development process is carried out in Fall 2013 and the actions to promote physical activity and to reduce sedentary behavior are implemented in the companies during spring and fall 2014. The follow-up evaluation with the same measures as at baseline will be conducted in November 2014.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label

primary_outcome.description: Change in the accelerometer-determined and self-reported (questionnaire) physical activity and sedentary behavior of the employees from baseline to 12 months.

secondary_outcome.description: Change in the self-reported (questionnaire) work ability (scale from 0 to 10) from baseline to 12 months.

other_outcome.measure: Employees' participation in staff physical activity
other_outcome.description: Change in employees' self-reported (questionnaire) participation in staff physical activity from baseline to 12 months.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Promoting physical activity and reducing sedentary behavior
arm_group.description: Each company develops a plan to promote employees' physical activity and to reduce employees' sedentary behavior

intervention.intervention_name: Actions to increase physical activity and to reduce sedentary time
intervention.arm_group_label: Promoting physical activity and reducing sedentary behavior

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- companies: number of employees 15-150 (small or middle-sized)
- employees: all voluntary employees
Exclusion Criteria:
- companies: less than 15 or more than 150 employees
- employees: none

facility.name: The UKK Institute for Health Promotion Research
